name: Under the Chinese
description: We once again find ourselves beneath the Chinese boot. We must carry out the directives of our benefactors to the south.

name: National Unity Front
description: Few political parties are willing to cooperate with the Chinese. Despite this, to create the illusion of independence from China to external observers, we have been directed to create a broad unity. We must create new shell parties across the political spectrum to accomplish this.

name: Reorganise Military Structure
description: The Chinese have a fundamentally different attitude towards warefare than our people do. To facilitate cooperation and reduce military independence, we should bring our structures in line with those of China.

name: Chinese Officers
description: The Chinese have much to teach our people about warfare. We should integrate loyal ethnically Chinese officers into our forces.

name: Purge the Resistance
description: Many rural Mongolians refuse to recognise our government. We must show them the error of their ways.

name: Chinese Immigration
description: Our own people have proven unruly. We should incentivise skilled Chinese to immigrate to Mongolia to fill roles left vacant due to our people's hostility.

name: Loyalty to China
description: We should begin to promote the idea of Mongolia as both separate and a part of China. Slowly but surely the Mongol people will become loyal to China.

name: Mongolian KMT
description: The Kuomintang have triumphed over the old Mongol regime. The Mongolian Kuomintang, once languishing in obscurity has burst onto the scene to lead the new Mongolia forward, hand in hand with China.

name: Begin Land Reform
description: Land reform is an essential part of the KMT's platform, both right and left. The rural estates should be given over to those who work and graze them.

name: Push for Industrialisation
description: Economic modernisation is essential both for our nation to compete on the world stage and to integrate our economy with that of China. First, more formal cottage industries should be transformed into modern workshops.

name: The Mongolian NRA
description: The army should be reorganised on the principles of the National Revolutionary Army of the KMT.

name: Kuomintang Propaganda
description: The Kuomintang recognises the value of communication. We must widely publicise our platform.

name: Kuomintang Control
description: We must fully unite with the Chinese Kuomintang in thought. By promoting the commonality of our struggle and place in the world, slowly but surely the Mongol people will become loyal to the Kuomintang.
